name: EstevezSmart
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Integrate all Estévez Smart devices into a smart control network controlled by your voice.
To use this Skill, you must have a mobile device with Android or iOS, and access to a WiFi network.
Before activating this Skill, you must download and link your devices to the free Estevez Smart app from App Store or Play Store. Alexa will recognize the names you assign for each device from the Estevez Smart app.
Then, from Alexa app, get the Estevez Smart Skill, and sign in your Estevez Smart account.
All your devices will be able to be used with Alexa.

Try saying:
"Alexa, turn on the kitchen lights"
"Alexa, turn off the bedroom lights"
"Alexa, set the dining room lights to 25%"
"Alexa, turn off the dining room contact two"
"Alexa, set bedroom lights to green"
"Alexa, get low the fan speed"
